claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Header page of the Elsevier journal ‘Vaccine’ showing the journal title, publisher logo, and homepage URL, with no substantive content on flu vaccine production methods or mutation. does not support the claim because the image contains only a journal cover page and provides no information about cell- or egg-based flu vaccine production or mutations. Note: No relevant data or text visible; image quality sufficient but content unrelated to the claim.
